subject: [Radiance-general] DAYSIM vs. Radiance illuminance values
body:
Hi Nicolas,

Daysim is using the Perez Sky model, so I would use gendaylit instead of
gensky for a comparision.
Secondly, I assume, that you have to use the -R instead of the -r
Option, since you are dealing with irradiance rather than radiance. This
is causing the big difference, I assume.
But  be careful: -R is expecting horizontal direct irradiation, not
direct normal irradiance!

Jan
